description.integration: Simplify your delivery fleet man. Management. Organize and manage your last-mile operations with end-to-end fleet management and intelligent route optimization. Hyperlocal delivery management platform for your shipments.

ai_description.integration: The Fynd_TMS activity is used to streamline and manage last-mile delivery operations by providing end-to-end fleet management and intelligent route optimization, making it ideal for organizing hyperlocal delivery shipments; it supports operations such as creating and updating shipments, as well as custom operations tailored to specific needs.
